body:
An eCommerce mobile app (Android, IOS, Web Mobile)

This project is written in ionic and angular and provides native features using a Cordova and Capacitor. It's cross-platform. I'm the developer working for android, IOS, web mobile, and APIs. I do very little on the website, but I help sometime when there are bugs or when there is a need for a mobile app like deep link and redirect URLs for desktop and mobile browsers.

If you want to see the demo, here are the links:
Facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/pesoapp.ph
Website - https://pesoapp.ph
Play store - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=xyz.appmaker.jkspsq
App Store - https://apps.apple.com/ph/app/pinoy-electronic-store-online/id1485215649
Web mobile - https://mb.pesoapp.ph

I developed it using Macbook Pro laptop provided by the company

 

Screenshot for running the app on android studio and xcode

 

Screenshot for deploying or publish the app on play store, app store and hosting using firebase

 

Screenshot for debugging the app using chrome inspect and safari inspect
desc: Mobile App for Pinoy Electronic Store Online
title: Pinoy Electronic Store Online

body:
Features:
User register
Find match people based on age and gender
Members can like, message, and view profile
Lists of a member that like you and you like
Update profile picture, description, looking for, interests, and location details
Message tabs for unread, inbox, and outbox

Screenshot - https://ibb.co/album/N9vpww

 

Source code - https://bitbucket.org/marckevinflores/datingapp/src/master/

 

if you want to update this project, you can send me a message on my email

 

How to run:

  1. download Dotnet sdk x64 and Node.js
  2. run npm install -g @angular/cli on command line
  3. cd DatingApp.API
  4. dotnet run watch
  5. cd DatingApp-SPA
  6. npm install
  7. ng serve
title: Dating App

body: My first project, I have done using MERN stack technology. This project is social media for developers. They can update your profile, make posts, and you can like or dislike the post. This project is open source you can download it on Github here is the link https://github.com/marckevinflores/devconnector
desc: MERN Stack Social Media App for Developers
title: Developer Connector - Social Media App

body:
An unofficial social dating website. This project is not finished yet, because I don't have time yet. For now, I will show it as a landing page. But I plan to make it a real dating website next time.
